item.description:
RAIN OR SHINE, AND UNLESS UNFORSEEN OBSTACLE, I shall plan to go to the ticket agent for Lucky Star bus by 6:00 a.m. to purchase bus tickets - if you beat me there, go ahead and get yours, if not, I can and you can pay me on the bus.

Be at the ticket agent for Lucky Star bus between 6:00 and 6:10 a.m. - you all have my phone # now - if you see it is 6:10 and you aren't there yet, call me ASAP. Thanks.

PLEASE CALL - DO NOT TEXT - TERMINAL IS TOO LOUD AND CRAZY FOR ME TO LOOK AT MY PHONE FOR TEXT - THANKS.[/color]


WHERE IS SOUTH STATION? ATLANTIC AVENUE, BOSTON, AT 1 SOUTH STATION - South Station is on the Red Line if you are heading south from Cambridge, Somerville, it is the stop directly after Downtown Crossing - you will want to allow time for these early morning t-lines and also time to follow the signs through South Station to get to the bus terminal. If you are coming south from Quincy, South Boston, Dorchester, it is the stop afer Broadway. If someone is dropping you off or you are taking a cab from anywhere, South Station Bus Terminal is on the Atlantic Avenue side just a few blocks from the Expressway (Route 93) where it empties into the Chinatown area of Boston.

WHERE IS THE BUS TERMINAL?

You enter the bus terminal, head up the escalator, follow the crowds heading right from the escalator - this hallway gets you to a quick set of stairs to the Lucky Star ticket agents who will quickly sell you your ticket and send you down the boarding doors with a gate #.


Here is a link to the Lucky Star schedule:
http://www.luckystarb...

HOW DO WE GET TO FLUSHING? We will walk from Lucky Star's New York depot a couple of blocks to Division Street, near East Broadway, where Mr. Zhou runs his famous Da Zhong Hua bus lines all over Manhattan and Queens - we will get the first available bus and take it to Flushing.
